text: OSLO, Oct 12 Equinors Melkoeya liquefied natural gas (LNG) plant in Norway is expected to resume output on Jan. 1 of 2021, the company said in a regulatory statement on Monday.The plant was damaged in a fire on Sept. 28 and will remain shut until the end of the year. (Reporting by Terje Solsvik, editing by Nerijus Adomaitis)
